00242 /* ---------------- CHECK PARAMETER DEFINITIONS ---------------------------- */
00243 /* Macros check GPDMA channel */
00244 #define PARAM_GPDMA_CHANNEL(n)  ((n>=0) && (n<=7))
00245 
00246 /* Macros check GPDMA connection type */
00247 #define PARAM_GPDMA_CONN(n)             ((n==GPDMA_CONN_SSP0_Tx) || (n==GPDMA_CONN_SSP0_Rx) \
00248 || (n==GPDMA_CONN_SSP1_Tx) || (n==GPDMA_CONN_SSP1_Rx) \
00249 || (n==GPDMA_CONN_ADC) || (n==GPDMA_CONN_I2S_Channel_0) \
00250 || (n==GPDMA_CONN_I2S_Channel_1) || (n==GPDMA_CONN_DAC) \
00251 || (n==GPDMA_CONN_UART0_Tx) || (n==GPDMA_CONN_UART0_Rx) \
00252 || (n==GPDMA_CONN_UART1_Tx) || (n==GPDMA_CONN_UART1_Rx) \
00253 || (n==GPDMA_CONN_UART2_Tx) || (n==GPDMA_CONN_UART2_Rx) \
00254 || (n==GPDMA_CONN_UART3_Tx) || (n==GPDMA_CONN_UART3_Rx) \
00255 || (n==GPDMA_CONN_MAT0_0) || (n==GPDMA_CONN_MAT0_1) \
00256 || (n==GPDMA_CONN_MAT1_0) || (n==GPDMA_CONN_MAT1_1) \
00257 || (n==GPDMA_CONN_MAT2_0) || (n==GPDMA_CONN_MAT2_1) \
00258 || (n==GPDMA_CONN_MAT3_0) || (n==GPDMA_CONN_MAT3_1))
00259 
00260 /* Macros check GPDMA burst size type */
00261 #define PARAM_GPDMA_BSIZE(n)    ((n==GPDMA_BSIZE_1) || (n==GPDMA_BSIZE_4) \
00262 || (n==GPDMA_BSIZE_8) || (n==GPDMA_BSIZE_16) \
00263 || (n==GPDMA_BSIZE_32) || (n==GPDMA_BSIZE_64) \
00264 || (n==GPDMA_BSIZE_128) || (n==GPDMA_BSIZE_256))
00265 
00266 /* Macros check GPDMA width type */
00267 #define PARAM_GPDMA_WIDTH(n) ((n==GPDMA_WIDTH_BYTE) || (n==GPDMA_WIDTH_HALFWORD) \
00268 || (n==GPDMA_WIDTH_WORD))
00269 
00270 /* Macros check GPDMA status type */
00271 #define PARAM_GPDMA_STAT(n)     ((n==GPDMA_STAT_INT) || (n==GPDMA_STAT_INTTC) \
00272 || (n==GPDMA_STAT_INTERR) || (n==GPDMA_STAT_RAWINTTC) \
00273 || (n==GPDMA_STAT_RAWINTERR) || (n==GPDMA_STAT_ENABLED_CH))
00274 
00275 /* Macros check GPDMA transfer type */
00276 #define PARAM_GPDMA_TRANSFERTYPE(n) ((n==GPDMA_TRANSFERTYPE_M2M)||(n==GPDMA_TRANSFERTYPE_M2P) \
00277 ||(n==GPDMA_TRANSFERTYPE_P2M)||(n==GPDMA_TRANSFERTYPE_P2P))
00278 
00279 /* Macros check GPDMA state clear type */
00280 #define PARAM_GPDMA_STATCLR(n)  ((n==GPDMA_STATCLR_INTTC) || (n==GPDMA_STATCLR_INTERR))
00281 
00282 /* Macros check GPDMA request select type */
00283 #define PARAM_GPDMA_REQSEL(n)   ((n==GPDMA_REQSEL_UART) || (n==GPDMA_REQSEL_TIMER))
